title: Teacher-Led Project-Based Learning for Adaptive Learning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology and understanding of mathematics curriculum content
context.additional_context: Strengthening Capabilities for Designing Adaptive Learning Systems in Mathematics Education for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can derive core requirements for adaptive learning systems using scenario-based needs analysis methods.
Learners can establish implementation strategies in resource-constrained technological environments following teacher-led design principles.
Learners develop the ability to improve system prototypes through iterative requirement validation processes.
Learners can analyze the success factors of adaptive learning systems by linking them to learner expectations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
